Detailed Description

AppMutex ensures exclusive access on Application level. When two or more applications need to access a shared resource at the same time, synchronization is a coordination process to ensure that the resource is used by only one Application at a time. This can happen if inside a code section which should be protected by mutual exlusion the application is pending in an active wait (AppContainer::Wait). Then a Mutex can not block another Application which runs in the same AppContainer context - so an AppMutex has to be used.
